00072             function                set_add_limitations( $theAddLimitation )
00073             {
00074                   try
00075                   {
00076                         if( $this->AddLimitations === '1 = 1' )
00077                         {
00078                               $this->AddLimitations = $theAddLimitation;
00079                         }
00080                         else
00081                         {
00082                               throw( new Exception( '"AddLimitations" was already set' ) );
00083                         }
00084                   }
00085                   catch( Exception $e )
00086                   {
00087                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00088                   }
00089             }

00113             function                unsafe_select( $Condition )
00114             {
00115                   try
00116                   {
00117                         $Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00118                         $Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00119                         
00120                         $Records = $Database->select( '*' , $this->NativeTable , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND $Condition" );
00121                         
00122                         return( $Records );
00123                   }
00124                   catch( Exception $e )
00125                   {
00126                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00127                   }
00128             }

00168             function                select( $Start , $Limit , $Field = false , $Order = false , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00169             {
00170                   try
00171                   {
00172                         $Condition = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->select_condition( 
00173                               $Start , $Limit , $Field , $Order , $Condition
00174                         );
00175                         
00176                         return( $this->unsafe_select( $Condition ) );
00177                   }
00178                   catch( Exception $e )
00179                   {
00180                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00181                   }

00206             function                get_by_id( $id )
00207             {
00208                   try
00209                   {
00210                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00211                         $id = $Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00212                         
00213                         $Records = $this->unsafe_select( $this->NativeTable.".id = $id" );
00214                         
00215                         if( count( $Records ) == 0 )
00216                         {
00217                               throw( new Exception( 'Record was not found' ) );
00218                         }
00219                         
00220                         return( $Records[ 0 ] );
00221                   }
00222                   catch( Exception $e )
00223                   {
00224                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00225                   }
00226             }

00246             function                create( $Record )
00247             {
00248                   try
00249                   {
00250                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( $Record , 'name:string' );
00251                         
00252                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00253 
00254                         $id = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->create( $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values );
00255 
00256                         return( $id );
00257                   }
00258                   catch( Exception $e )
00259                   {
00260                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00261                   }

00295             function                get_menu_list( $Start , $Limit )
00296             {
00297                   try
00298                   {
00299                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00300                         $Start = $Security->get( $Start , 'integer' );
00301                         $Limit = $Security->get( $Limit , 'integer' );
00302                         
00303                         $Databse = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00304                         $Result = $Databse->select( '*' , 'umx_menu' , "$this->AddLimitations LIMIT $Start , $Limit" );
00305                         foreach( $Result as $i => $r )
00306                         {
00307                               $Result[ $i ] = array_merge( array( 'n' => $i + 1 ) , $Result );
00308                         }
00309                         
00310                         return( $Result );
00311                   }
00312                   catch( Exception $e )
00313                   {
00314                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00315                   }
00316             }

00351                               false , false , false , false , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND menu LIKE '$Menu'"
00352                         );

00384             function                get_menu( $Menu )
00385             {
00386                   try
00387                   {
00388                         $Security = & get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00389                         $Menu = $Security->get( $Menu , 'command' );
00390                         
00391                         $Databse = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00392                         $Result = $Databse->select( '*' , 'umx_menu' , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND name LIKE '$Menu'" );
00393                         if( count( $Result ) !== 1 )
00394                         {
00395                               throw( new Exception( "An error occured while selecting menu" ) );
00396                         }
00397                         else
00398                         {
00399                               return( $Result[ 0 ] );
00400                         }
00401                   }
00402                   catch( Exception $e )
00403                   {
00404                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00405                   }
00406             }

00430             function                update_menu( $OldMenuLocator , $NewMenuLocator )
00431             {
00432                   try
00433                   {
00434                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00435                         $OldMenuLocator = $Security->get( $OldMenuLocator , 'command' );
00436                         $NewMenuLocator = $Security->get( $NewMenuLocator , 'command' );
00437                         
00438                         $Databse = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00439                         $Databse->update( 
00440                               'umx_menu' , array( 'name' ) , array( $NewMenuLocator ) , 
00441                               "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND name LIKE '$OldMenuLocator'"
00442                         );
00443                         $Databse->commit();
00444                   }
00445                   catch( Exception $e )
00446                   {
00447                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00448                   }
00449             }

00470             {

00478                         $Database->commit();
